summary: Three poor Black kids in rural Mississippi reap the consequences of their family's cycle of abuse, addiction, and violence.
cast: Adam Clark|Malcolm Goodwin|Michael Hyatt|Malcolm David Kelley|Jossie Thacker|Tessa Thompson|Simbi Kali|D.B. Woodside|Chasity Kershal Hammitte|Kylee Russell|Cynthia Addai-Robinson|Michael Beasley|Donna Biscoe|Southey Blanton|Benjamin Brown|Halle Brown|Jasmine Burke|Gordon Danniels|Michael Harding|Stevonte Hart|Maria Howell|Nikkita Johnson|Leland L. Jones|Elijah Long|Michael L. Nesbitt|Michael J. Pagan|Charles Parnell|Selassie Singh|Tonea Stewart|Darrion Tillman|Joseph Whitfield|Mark Wilson|Vaughn Wilson|Tina Witherby
title: Mississippi Damned
